LanguageData.MSDrugMixer.label: Drug Chemical Mixer
LanguageData.MSDrugMixer.description:
A machine for preparing drug precursor elements:
Neutroamine: Chemfuel and Glycerol.
Glycerol: Chemfuel and (Beer or Ethanol).
Phenol: Chemfuel.
Lithium Salts: Stone Chunks, Chemfuel and (Phenol or Sulphuric Acid).
Opium Latex: Opium Seed Pods.
Sulphur: Stone Chunks.
Sulphuric Acid: Sulphur.
Ethanol: Chemfuel and Sulphuric Acid.
Hydrogen Peroxide: Chemfuel, Neutroamine and Sulphuric Acid.
Mercury Salts: Stone Chunks
Ethyl Mercury: Chemfuel and Mercury Salts.
LanguageData.MSDrugMixInput.label: Drug Chemical Mixer Input
LanguageData.MSDrugMixInput.description: Holds input resources for use by the drug chemical mixer during production.
LanguageData.MSDrugMixOutput.label: Drug Chemical Mixer Output
LanguageData.MSDrugMixOutput.description: Holds output products from the drug chemical mixer.
